title: Måneskin
subtitle: One of the most influential bands of the last 20 years
curator: Fiorella Di Matteo, Marika Di Matteo
description: Introducing the sensational rock band Maneskin, an Italian rock band formed in 2016 that has captured the hearts of music enthusiasts worldwide, with their edgy performances and their rebellious spirit. This band has reached massive international success, especially after winning the European Song Contest in 2021, becoming the leading exporters of Italian culture all over the world. Today this group continues to redefine the boundaries of modern rock music.

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Number of members of Italian rock bands
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q38 . # from italy
     ?band wdt:P527 ?item . 
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label         ?label.
      }



}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
LIMIT 10

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Number of Italian rock bands per year
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT (year(xsd:dateTime(?date)) as ?label)  (COUNT(?label) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q38 . # from italy
     ?band wdt:P2031 ?date . # formation year         
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label ?label.
      }

}

GROUP BY ?count ?date
ORDER BY ?label
LIMIT 20

dynamic_elements.text:
Performing in the streets in their early days, Måneskin rose to prominence after coming second in the eleventh season of the Italian version of X Factor in 2017. As for their unique name, it was suggested by Victoria De Angelis, who is half Danish. After a short brainstorming session, they agreed on Måneskin, which means moonlight.

If you want to learn more about their history, click here.

dynamic_elements.textsearch_title: Search for the name of the band to discover more about it

dynamic_elements.action_query: SELECT DISTINCT ?Member ?MemberLabel (year(xsd:dateTime(?BirthDate)) as ?Birth) ?BirthPlace ?BirthPlaceLabel ?VoiceType ?VoiceTypeLabel ?Pic WHERE { wd:Q56884561 wdt:P527 ?Member . ?Member wdt:P569 ?BirthDate . OPTIONAL {?Member wdt:P19 ?BirthPlace.} OPTIONAL {?Member wdt:P412 ?VoiceType.} OPTIONAL {?Member wdt:P18 ?Pic.} SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".} } LIMIT 10

dynamic_elements.table_query: SELECT (?instrumentLabel AS ?label) (COUNT(?member) AS ?count) WHERE { wd:Q56884561 wdt:P527 ?member. ?member wdt:P1303 ?instrument. ?instrument rdfs:label ?instrumentLabel. FILTER (lang(?instrumentLabel) = "en"). } GROUP BY ?instrument ?instrumentLabel ORDER BY DESC(?count)
